casebody.data:
Hubbard Smith et al. v. The Fort Street and Elmwood Avenue Railway Company. The court held that the points involved in this case are fully covered by the decision in the case of Schneider v. The Tort Street and Elmwood Avenue Railway Company, 15 Mich. 74. Wm. Gray, and T. Romeyn, for plaintiffs in error. E. C. Hinsdale, for defendants in error.

Bears May 1st.

Decides May 12th.

Error to Wayne Circuit.
